title: Is Horizon Zero Dawn Going to be a Trilogy? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.24.20
description:
00:04:30 - Housekeeping
We’re streaming Predator: Hunting Grounds today. It’s Kinda Funny vs. Kinda Funny at 3 p.m. PT on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames. This is the first stream in our Illfonic sponsorship, so look for details on how to play with us on next week’s streams… well, next week!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Al Tribesman,Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:08:30 - Is Horizon Zero Dawn going to be a trilogy? - Andy Robinson @ Video Games Chronicle
00:21:00 - At what point does a world become too big and the devs have to reel it back in? Do you want a larger world or are you afraid it'll be empty? - Best Friends Q:Frankfurtter
00:29:15 - Nintendo confirms 160,000 Nintendo Accounts have been accessed in hacking attempts - Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:32:28 - WWE has confirmed, there’s no WWE2K21 coming this year - Matt Kim @ IGN
00:38:38 - Do you no longer smell what The Rock is cooking? Is this rock bottom for 2K? - Best Friends Q:BJ Bernardo
00:43:10 - Final Fantasy 14 is finally streamlining A Realm Reborn - Jade King @ Trusted Reviews
00:45:36 - Out today
00:48:32 -  BROOKLINEN
00:50:05 - EXPRESS VPN
 Reader mail   -
00:52:20 - Do you think that cultural impact will be enough to win games like Animal Crossing Game of the Year, even if it doesn't do what we previously identified as being reasons to vote a game as GOTY? - The Nano Biologist
01:03:25 - Squad Up:Mathijs(Xbox One) - Ma7hijs
01:04:50 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Blessing and Tim
TUESDAY: Blessing and Imran
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Gary
THURSDAY: Greg and Blessing
FRIDAY: Blessing and Tim
